Issue.creator: caod
Issue.description: In an effort to maintain consistency as well as discussion in https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/c/fabric/+/29132/5 let's rename all mentions of `PvtData`, `PrivateData`, `Privatedata`, `Privdata`, `PrivData` to Pvtdata and likewise for unexported fields/methods. Manish suggested that we treat Pvtdata as one entity hence one word. Let's also rename the `privdata` package in `gossip` as well
